subtitles:
260413 263234 You are confused, aren't you?
Frightened.
263297 265126 That's all right. I can help you.
265348 266053 Who is this?

266259 268770 I am a doctor. Now, you must
listen to me. You have lost...

268972 271103 ...your memory.
There was an experiment.

271104 272898 Something went wrong.
Your memory was erased.
273049 273953 Do you understand me?

274133 276139 No, I don't understand.
What the hell is going on here?

276764 278005 Just listen.
There are people coming for you...

278142 281266 ...even as we speak. You must not
let them find you. You must leave now.
282432 284078 Hello? Are you there?

344144 346696 Hey, Mr. Murdoch.
The Automat called.
346697 348513 Said you left your wallet there.

349509 352875 I suggest you retrieve it
since you only paid for 3 weeks...
352876 354831 ...and they was up 10 minutes ago.
356753 358300 I've been here 3 weeks?

358320 361153 It's right there in
black and white, Mr. Murdoch.
361424 363170 Day and date.

363900 367257 We make our books like we make
our beds, all neat and tidy.
367333 369044 I'll take care of it when I get back.

369222 372188 See that you do. Only thing
makes you a guest in this joint...
372189 374482 ...pal, is cash on the barrelhead.

397790 400500 House rules.
3 weeks is 3 weeks.
400750 403149 No days off for good behavior.
425108 428785 Mr. Murdoch, yes, where is he?
429038 432483 He just left not 5 minutes ago.

440029 443562 When marimba rhythms
start to play
443916 446013 Dance with me
446278 448643 Make me sway

449103 452981 Like a lazy ocean
hugs the shore

453257 457930 Hold me close
Sway me more
458645 462540 Like a flower bending in the breeze
462934 464899 Bend with me
465377 467675 Sway with ease

467943 471699 When we dance
you have a way with me

472285 476772 Stay with me
Sway with me
477877 479093 Hey, sweetie!

479816 481800 He said he was
your husband's doctor.
481991 483830 He wanted to speak with you.

506863 508661 - Dr. Sh--
- Schreber.

508691 512900 Please, won't you come in?
You must be Emma Murdoch.

513800 517296 Thank you for coming to see me
on such short notice.
519158 520412 What is this?

521507 525702 A rather crude experiment...
designed to further my studies.
525768 526805 I don't understand.

526806 532008 You say you're my husband's doctor,
but he never mentioned you to me.

532222 535872 The truth is, Mrs. Murdoch... John has been
coming to see me for quite some time.

536144 539634 He had been grappling
with feelings of betrayal...

539689 542405 ...stemming from your
marital difficulties.

543019 545155 - John told you what happened?
- Yes.

546245 548327 When was the last time
that you saw him?

550125 553783 He packed a suitcase.
He was very angry at me.

553891 556863 I understand how difficult
this must be for you.

557099 561178 But for John's sake, I would like you
to think of me as your friend, Emma.

561644 564535 It appears that John has suffered
a psychotic break.
564824 566829 Complete memory loss.

567934 571336 He may be delusional.
Even violent.

574105 577376 ...if he were to contact you,
and I suspect he will...

577857 580690 ...you must call me immediately.
Do you understand?

580820 584086 It is imperative that I be
the first one to reach him.

584894 588382 Wherever your husband is,
he is searching...
602375 604133 Good evening, Mr. Murdoch.
604567 606695 It is Mr. Murdoch, isn't it?

607269 610828 Mr. -was it
"J"-something-Murdoch?
615500 618402 What's your name? Justin? Jerry?

622528 624504 My name's Jason Murdoch.
John Murdoch.
624744 626012 Jake Murdoch. How's it going?
626167 627099 Hi. Jack Murdoch.

674527 677449 I told the guy,
"Cash on the barrelhead."
677560 680951 I said, "Listen, 3 weeks is 3 weeks."
681083 682270 Where's our lucky winner?
682501 684873 Upstairs, sir, room 614.
685711 687184 Another call girl.

691747 694785 - Evening, Husselbeck.
- Inspector Bumstead.
695124 696564 Your lace is untied.
709882 711557 Am I glad you're here, sir.

711757 714236 They say Detective Walenski's
got the heebie-jeebies.

714342 716357 Just take what they
give me, Husselbeck.

725311 727634 Wow. Looks like somebody
woke up on the wrong side of the bed.

770870 772516 - Hello.
- Oh, it's you.

773460 776026 - You left your wallet here, buddy.
- When did I do that?
776198 777160 When you was last here.

777420 780024 - When was that?
- When you left your wallet.
780336 781937 You expect me to remember?
785177 788614 Hello. Excuse me.
789208 790259 No, no, seriously.

809492 811427 - Where you headed, chief?
- Home.
811682 812808 And where's home?

812978 815130 Haven't you mugs
got anything better to do?

815811 817901 Well, I'm just trying
to do my job, May.

818073 819956 There's a killer out there
in case you hadn't noticed.

820186 822732 Maybe you should be out looking for him
instead of cooling your heels, huh?
825978 827755 Go on, get out of here.
838197 840572 Round and round she goes.
843108 847164 Where she stops? Nobody knows.

850132 853100 What's that make so far, Husselbeck?
6 hookers in all?
853170 854401 I believe so, sir.
855094 857051 Give the man an "A" for effort.

857263 861478 You'd think these stiffs would have the good
grace to expire at a good time of night.
862688 864982 Hey, too bad about Walenski, huh?
868407 870007 I guess he'd seen enough.
877299 878199 So, Husselbeck...

879445 885771 ...what kind of killer do you think
stops to save a dying fish?
886144 887094 You've got me, sir.
887095 889049 Bumstead, what took you?

889375 892388 This killer's been running circles
around us thanks to Walenski.

892389 894146 With all due respect,
Chief Inspector...

894147 896878 I've known Eddie a long time.
He's a good cop.

897536 901544 Whatever kind of cop Walenski once was,
he let drift a long time ago.
901754 903006 Let me talk to Bumstead!
906377 907408 Frank, Frank!

910185 912166 - Get his arm!
- They're watching us!

912238 914422 - On your feet.
- There's no way out!
916302 917882 God, can't you see?!
921427 922555 Let me go, let me go!
922805 923848 I'm not gonna hurt you. I'm not--

925091 927305 - What was that?
- Walenski.
935901 938573 I'm being punished for my sins, right?
939134 941417 What did I ever do to inherit this?
941437 942551 Where do you begin?

943135 947569 Well, everything Detective Walenski
committed to paper should be here, so--

947609 950505 The only thing that should
be committed is Walenski.
952795 954821 Nothing like a little healthy paranoia.

958397 960863 Sir, we just got
the fingerprint results in.
964944 966753 What is this, some kind of joke?
970930 972520 Don't throw anything away.
978327 979668 Inspector Bumstead.

981797 984675 I came here to file
a missing persons report for my husband.
985211 986915 Take it to the front desk.
987486 989042 They told me to come see you.
991160 993027 His name's John Murdoch.

994326 997399 Mrs. Murdoch,
why didn't you report this before?

997400 1002056 I mean, if your husband has been missing
as long as you say...

1002664 1004527 I thought he'd simply
walked out on me.

1006105 1009804 Then a... doctor contacted me
this evening.

1010479 1013253 - How long have you been married?
- Nearly four years.
1014580 1015580 Why do you ask?

1016054 1018945 Because you seem uncomfortable
with your ring.

1019230 1022980 As if you were...
unaccustomed to wearing it.
1023352 1024608 No, I never take it off.

1030890 1034447 Do these names
mean anything to you?
1040366 1042449 No. Who are these women?

1043829 1047668 Why are you looking for my husband?
Are you going to accuse him of something?
1047703 1049843 Maybe. Maybe murder.
1050160 1051010 Whose murder?

1052614 1056101 - Which one?
- All of them.

1056976 1060531 Mrs. Murdoch, I am sorry, I'm sorry.
I didn't mean to alarm you.

1060532 1063118 I'm so sorry that I came.
Just both made a mistake.
1063119 1064636 Mrs. Murdoch, if you please.

1064637 1067002 If you'll just give me
half a second to explain--
1070259 1071352 I'll be right out.
1095627 1096847 Have we met before?

1098274 1101483 If we did...
I hope you're still breathing.
1101714 1103176 What's your name, honey?
1106889 1108652 Well, that's an appropriate name.
1116539 1118195 I was just thinking.
1124897 1127756 ...seems kind of dangerous...

1130457 1132106 I mean, how do you know
I'm not the killer?

1132147 1135264 You don't seem like
the killer type. Why?

1136572 1138730 You feeling any urges
I should know about?

1220849 1224557 So it seems you've discovered
your unpleasant nature.

1227826 1231920 - Who are you?
- We might ask the same question, yes?

1315881 1319237 What is to be done?
This man is dangerous.
1319268 1321186 It is said he is able to tune.
1321306 1322470 Impossible.

1322710 1325148 We have seen it
with our own eyes.

1325574 1327754 On occasion the imprinting
does not take.

1327973 1330644 They behave erratically
when they awaken.

1330906 1334523 We find them wandering
like lost children.
1334596 1336765 But this one was different, yes?

1336901 1338423 What has the doctor
to say about this?
1338608 1340335 He has failed to report in.

1340591 1343629 - And Mr. Quick?
- No more Mr. Quick.
1343799 1346656 Mr. Quick, dead, yes.
1349678 1352352 Poor, poor Mr. Quick.
1352613 1355221 Mr. Book, does he know?
1356688 1358402 Should we not know, Mr. Hand?

1359391 1362234 We had hoped to learn more
before sharing with you.

1362444 1365244 We can know nothing
until we possess him.
1366158 1368848 Mr. Night, you will take the East.

1369050 1373608 Mr. Face, you the West.
Mr. Glove, the South.
1373778 1375970 Mr. Shade, the North.
1377753 1380131 We must have this man.

1394249 1399013 Do you really think my husband could be
capable of committing those murders?

1402794 1405194 Let's hope, for both our sakes,
that I'm wrong.
1450525 1452082 I've been so worried about you.
1455754 1457306 Are you punishing me?

1457939 1460365 You know, if disappearing
is your way of punishing me...

1460385 1463118 ...I don't appreciate it.
- I don't know what you're talking about.
1466365 1468292 I found these keys in my pocket...
1469140 1470556 ...so I assume I live here.

1472127 1474846 - You supposed to be my wife?
- Supposed to be?
1479996 1482101 ...don't know who I am, do you?

1483206 1485899 Your doctor called me.
He was worried that this might happen.

1485919 1488443 - My doctor?
- Yeah. He...
1490216 1491773 ...he gave me his card.
1492277 1494125 He's desperate to find you.

1501666 1503732 I feel like I'm living out
someone else's nightmare.

1503762 1506267 What happened to me?
Why was I seeing a doctor?
1507135 1508840 I had an affair.
1510519 1512281 You were angry at me.
1515170 1517122 The police are looking for you.
1517332 1519199 I know. I saw the papers.
1519408 1522232 "Killer stalks city streetwalkers."
1525690 1528238 I was with one of those women...
1529176 1531048 ...before I came here tonight.
1531506 1532804 I don't understand.
1533518 1534855 I met her outside an Automat.
1535750 1538087 I guess I wanted to test myself.

1539330 1542536 I wanted to know if I had it in me
to do those things.

1543031 1545462 Maybe I have lost my mind,
but whoever I am...
1545463 1547455 ...I'm still me and I'm not a killer.
1553575 1555082 I believe you.

1563319 1565699 The car outside,
the one you arrived in.

1566147 1568606 It's a cop.
He dropped me off here.
1570579 1572427 I didn't know he was still here.
1575584 1577021 Hold it right there, mister!
1579481 1581570 Wait. You have the wrong man.

1581738 1584317 - Stand aside, will you, please?
- I didn't kill anyone.

1584346 1587743 Right now what you are
is a suspect. Turn yourself in.

1588563 1590161 I'll listen to whatever
you have to say.

1590162 1591770 You're not gonna believe
what I have to say.
1594517 1596010 There's someone after me.

1596501 1599429 There's this group of men.
They want me dead.

1599993 1602211 And I don't even know if--
They're not even--

1603074 1605128 Yeah, who's gonna
listen to a madman?
1605333 1606492 Stand aside, Mrs. Murdoch.
1612110 1614195 No one ever listens to me.
1620155 1621361 Murdoch, stop!

1664172 1666494 - How much further?
- We're almost there, buddy.

1670202 1672291 Hey, you happen to know
the way to Shell Beach?

1672561 1675637 You're kidding. Me and the missus
spent our honeymoon there.

1675807 1678317 All you gotta do is take
Main Street west to--
1680979 1682483 Or is it the cross--

1683224 1686575 You know, that's funny.
I can't seem to remember...

1686675 1688787 ...if it's Main Street west
or the cross-town.

1693428 1696771 I'm sorry, Inspector,
I cannot be of more assistance...

1696918 1698906 ...but I am running late
for an appointment.

1698911 1701055 Well, I appreciate
your taking the time.

1709631 1711869 There's just one thing
that puzzles me.

1711946 1716390 I've met quite a few murderers
in the course of my work.
1716721 1719138 Murdoch doesn't strike me as one.

1719434 1722719 Perhaps you are not accustomed
to digging deep enough.

1723118 1725487 Well, I do know when someone
is lying to me, Doctor.

1725687 1728149 Forgive me, Inspector,
but you are not a clinician.

1728606 1731907 Judging personalities
happens to be my business.

1732127 1734085 Well, maybe you could
give me a few pointers.
1735855 1737738 Let's take you, for instance.

1738153 1743612 You are a fastidious man, driven.
Consumed by details.
1744342 1746091 I would say your life is...

1747475 1751698 ...rather lonely. Good evening, Inspector.
I really must be going.

1793291 1797276 Closing time.
The pool is now closed.

1807042 1811793 Most unfortunate it is that we were
forced to seek you out here.

1812634 1817286 You know how uncomfortable
we find all this... moisture.

1817626 1820949 - I'm sorry. I--
- Failed to report in, yes.

1821079 1823618 I was frightened.
I have a weak heart, you know.

1823768 1827521 Your weakness is not, we think,
an affair of the heart.
1827522 1830223 We found this in his hotel room.

1830345 1834075 Must we reproduce
Mr. Murdoch's memories again?
1834255 1835178 I tried to imprint him...

1835179 1837405 ...but he woke up, he knocked
the syringe right out of my hand.
1837406 1839495 I tried to stop him but he was too fast.
1839671 1840812 He has no memories, then?

1840922 1844215 Only fragments.
The procedure, it was interrupted.

1844355 1847299 I guess it's only a matter
of rounding him up.
1848142 1849212 You have had strays before, right?

1849554 1853745 This is no stray, Doctor.
This one can tune.

1853765 1856501 But that's impossible.
I thought only you had that ability.

1856506 1860758 You will process another template
of the subject's memories, yes?
1860999 1862647 Of course. I'll imprint him again.

1862777 1867341 No. We require them
for a quite different purpose.
1868296 1870418 It's almost midnight, Dr. Schreber.

1870568 1872853 We'll talk again
after tonight's tuning, but...
1873331 1875266 ...no more delays, yes?

1875526 1880127 No more inconsistencies
in your behavior.
1887729 1889919 You appear quite frail, Doctor.

1891106 1894103 Perhaps some exercise
would do you good.

1914750 1916579 - How is he?
- The same.
1917492 1920301 Walenski? It's me, Frank.
1926724 1927868 Come in, Frank.
1930935 1932303 Close the door.

1940438 1943507 I've been looking through
some of your old reports.
1943660 1945723 It's an interesting case.

1946905 1950332 The kind that can make
a man's career...

1951938 1955102 ...or break it.
- Yeah, I was on that case.

1955570 1959460 And then what?
What happened then, Eddie?
1959565 1961023 Nothing happened, Frank.

1961713 1965793 I've just been spending time
on the subway, riding in circles.
1965913 1967504 Thinking in circles.
1968476 1969673 There's no way out.
1971479 1973320 I've been over every inch of this city.

1978206 1981992 - You're scaring your wife to death, Eddie.
- She's not my wife.

1983611 1986904 I don't know who she is.
I don't know who any of us are.
1987184 1988634 What makes you say that?

1989083 1990806 Do you think about
the past much, Frank?
1992050 1993620 As much as the next guy.

1994409 1997089 See, I've been trying
to remember things--

1997218 2000154 clearly remember things
from my past.

2000314 2005208 But the more I try to think back,
the more it all starts to unravel.
2005657 2006985 None of it seems real.

2007155 2010943 It's like I've just been
dreaming this life...

2011056 2013864 ...and when I finally wake up
I'll be somebody else.
2014002 2015862 Somebody totally different.

2020685 2023080 You saw something,
didn't you, Eddie?
2023790 2026448 Something to do with the case.

2026825 2030086 There is no case.
There never was!

2030517 2034496 It's all just a big joke!
It's a joke!
2075772 2077933 Tonight's requirements are...

2078032 2082783 ...12 family photo albums,
9 personal diaries...

2083078 2087855 ...17 love letters,
assorted childhood photographs...

2087963 2092116 ...26 wallets,
ID's and social security cards.
2092126 2094106 These do bring back memories.
2096447 2098687 This one is still warm.
2100832 2103783 The recollections of a great lover?
2104018 2106498 A catalog of conquests?
2107066 2108428 We will soon find out.

2109737 2114170 You wouldn't appreciate that,
would you, Mr. Whatever your name is?

2114609 2118769 Not the sort of conquests
you would ever understand.
2122273 2124864 A touch of unhappy childhood.
2130615 2133336 A dash of teenage rebellion.
2135096 2137228 And last, but not least...
2137923 2140494 ...a tragic death in the family.

2152026 2155843 Why does Murdoch not sleep
during the tuning as the others do?

2155880 2160105 I don't know. Maybe he's a step up
the evolutionary ladder.

2160171 2162854 A freak of nature.
He's adapting to survive.

2162864 2166260 What do you expect?
Weren't you looking for the human soul?

2166280 2168880 That's the purpose
of your little zoo, isn't it?

2168903 2172083 That's why you keep changing people
and things around every night.

2172213 2175022 Maybe you have finally found
what you are looking for...

2175023 2176600 ...and it's going
to bite you on your--

2180621 2184172 It requires several of your lifetimes
to master our gifts.

2184312 2188086 The idea that a simple man
could develop the ability to tune--

2188216 2191690 Is absurd, I know.
But what other explanation is there?
2243534 2245011 Shut it down.
2260801 2262041 Get your paper right here!

2273521 2276561 It's driving me crazy.
I can't sleep.

2276664 2279901 - And they call my job "unskilled".
- You think you've got it tough?

2279916 2281859 You try looking after these kids,
for a change.

2282452 2287012 Anyways, Frederickson says he'll
take me off the damn night shift soon.
2287264 2289260 Well, it's about time, dear.
2390461 2392546 Can anybody hear me?!
2395770 2398937 Let the tuning commence.

2558402 2561739 The Goodwins.
Jeremy, Sylvia...
2561932 2563918 ...Jane and little Matthew.
2567788 2569953 Jane and little Matthew.
2600207 2602252 The rich get richer.

2602610 2606438 Probably have maid's quarters
before the night is through.
2659517 2661432 Dr. Schreber, I presume.

2661852 2664368 - It's you.
- Hey, come on.

2664464 2666460 That's no way to greet
a patient, Doctor.

2666520 2669820 - If that's what you are, huh, Doctor?
- Mr. Murdoch, please, I--

2670034 2671845 What is happening here?
Why is everyone asleep?
2671995 2674248 Shh. Please keep your voice down.

2674355 2676196 Why can't I remember anything?
What have you done to me?

2676336 2679107 Nothing, nothing.
Please, I want to help you.

2679313 2682530 We can't talk here. It is not safe.
If they see us together, they'll--

2682720 2685288 I don't care! I want some answers.
I want some answers now!

2685546 2688273 Who are they?
Why are they trying to kill me?
2694932 2697899 My God. You really can do it.

2699621 2701839 Listen to me, John.
You have their power.

2701840 2703614 You can make things happen
by will alone.

2703868 2707261 They call it tuning. That is how
they make the buildings change.

2707371 2709823 Just now you acted out
of self-defense. A reflex.

2709963 2712773 But I can teach you to control
your power consciously.

2712783 2715112 Let me help you, John.
Together we can stop them.
2715122 2716637 We can take the city back.
2723120 2724853 My glasses, please.

2772059 2774625 He made a terrible
impression for the firm...
2774732 2777231 ...lollygagging around as he did.

2777451 2780257 So I simply told Frederickson
I was going to have to let him go.
2780377 2782450 And well you should have, darling.
2783253 2784712 He attacked me.

2785529 2789184 - I don't know where he has gone.
- Come, Dr. Schreber.
2790848 2793760 We have much to do. Yes?

2811108 2816973 They say that you're
a run-around lover
2818779 2821031 Though you say
2829750 2835518 But if you put me down for another

2837898 2844410 I'll know
Believe me, I'll know
2845906 2854118 'Cause the night has a thousand eyes
2854828 2858694 And a thousand eyes
2859032 2862067 Can't tell, but see
2864718 2871122 If you are true to me

2872593 2882365 So remember
When you tell those little white lies
2882548 2890475 That the night has a thousand eyes
2895953 2900517 A thousand eyes

2907104 2910734 Tonight's experiment shall be conducted
in the following locations.

2910874 2915172 The first subject
shall be imprinted here on Avenue M.
2915173 2917781 Mr. Book. There is a problem.

2917901 2921171 There is no Avenue M.
We were unable to complete it.

2921311 2924752 During the last tuning
we detected a lack of control.

2924772 2927604 An opposing influence
on the machines?

2927994 2932335 Then this man Murdoch
is more powerful than we thought.
2932346 2934188 He's becoming like us.
2934298 2937708 So we must become like him.

2938591 2941120 The good doctor
has done as we asked?

2941140 2944862 The life and times
of John Murdoch, Volume 2.
2946760 2949251 We must not do this.

2949411 2952870 Murdoch does not possess
these memories, yes?

2952950 2955542 How will his imprint
allow us to find him?
2955682 2957652 Everywhere he goes...

2957803 2960078 ...everyone he seeks out
will be known to us.

2960441 2965609 And as he follows the clues,
so shall we follow the memories.

2965742 2968326 Perhaps we have forgotten
what happened last time, when we t--
2968442 2971491 Yes. Poor, poor Mr.--
2971621 2973363 We have not forgotten.

2973553 2980673 If Mr. Hand wishes to make this
sacrifice for the greater good...

2982682 2987988 But to imprint one of us.
Failure has always resulted.

2988108 2991608 What Mr. Hand proposes
is our only option.
2998595 3000374 This may sting a bit.
3043197 3046914 I have John Murdoch... in mind.

3053460 3056631 ..."I found this postcard
among your mother's things."
3057014 3059075 "Brings back memories, doesn't it?"
3059463 3060885 "Stop by sometime."

3061186 3064251 "We'll see if we can't hook ourselves
another mermaid."
3064448 3067124 "Love to Emma. Karl."
3075585 3076516 Karl Harris.

3094214 3096665 Excuse me. Can you tell me
the way to Avenue C?
3097207 3098590 Try the subway.

3102852 3107103 - You got a problem, pal?
- You been working here long?

3108078 3111576 25 years. No days off
for good behavior.
3136656 3139726 We're looking for John Murdoch.
3173924 3175959 She knows nothing, Mr. Hand.
3176069 3178248 A dead end, yes, Mr. Wall.

3178518 3180743 We thought his imprint would
allow us to track him, yes...

3180744 3184765 ...but instead we have been
brought here. This is irrational.
3184766 3187300 Instincts are irrational, Mr. Wall...

3187450 3190414 ...and we must follow
where they lead, yes.

3190680 3195228 Mr. Sleep suggests he may go
to places familiar... his job.

3195448 3200164 - He does not care about our job.
- Indulge us, Mr. Hand.
3200232 3202762 If you were Murdoch--
3203040 3206253 If... I were Murdoch...
3208205 3209378 I would remember...

3209898 3213575 ...how my wife had hurt me
by sleeping with another man.

3218601 3221858 ...I would look for a way
to hurt her in return.
3225295 3227421 Leave me alone with her.
3228088 3229721 There's work to be done.

3233300 3238264 All change, platform 3.

3241658 3242905 You want the Express.

3261057 3261870 There's no way out, you know?

3270714 3272672 - Who are you?

3273260 3275794 At least, in this life, I was.

3276103 3278315 They steal people's

3278681 3280641 Then they swap them around

3280674 3283357 I've seen them do it.

3283358 3285605 ...till no one knows

3285606 3286926 How do you know all this?

3293707 3295190 It happened to me.
3295764 3297518 They'll come looking for you, Murdoch.

3315450 3316650 They were here.

3325031 3326793 That was when we loved her.

3338501 3340093 And I know where to find her.

3352732 3356834 To be able to revisit those places

3363293 3367305 But imagine a life

3368011 3369976 ...in which your memories

3369977 3372821 ...but those shared

3374101 3377259 Imagine the torment

3378448 3381331 ...no experiences to call your own.

3392182 3394658 Something... better.

3401384 3403136 Biggest thing you ever saw.

3410149 3411729 ...on this very spot.

3419266 3421973 I met my wife at this place.

3627273 3628853 I looked after you.

3660430 3662523 Why are you here, Mrs. Murdoch?

3677897 3680804 He told me he wanted

3695018 3698852 I wanted to talk to her. I thought maybe

3700523 3702680 Stay here.

3713773 3718977 Yeah, this is Bumstead. Send the

3719271 3720694 There's been another one.

3737507 3739798 It's OK. I won't hurt you.

3815331 3816673 It's beautiful.

3834137 3835897 It's a funny thing, though.

3886432 3889066 You're tired. Anything's possible.

3920289 3923067 "Guide to Shell Beach

4395798 4397380 Explain this.

4469338 4471921 It was as if you were a stranger.

4500256 4502243 I love you, John.

4666869 4669074 Yes. Yes, of course.

4690427 4692551 Well, for now, let's just say...

4698657 4700719 You're not crazy, John.

4711450 4712978 Everything you need to know...

4789816 4792199 If you've been there, you can

4855083 4856966 Who are you people?

4869397 4871509 You will be soon, yes.
4875450 4878101 I have another use for her first.

4884800 4890169 First there was darkness.

4892124 4894754 They abducted us

4895814 4897942 This city, everyone in it...
4898787 4900058 ...is their experiment.

4900228 4902974 They mix and match

4902975 4905756 ...trying to divine

4906234 4908934 One day, a man

4909027 4911947 The next, someone entirely different.

4915680 4920156 ...they simply imprint one of their

4920548 4924518 ...arrange a family for him,

4925417 4926421 ...even a lost wallet.
4926892 4928573 Then they observe the results.

4931643 4934088 ...of a killer, continue in that vein?

4943388 4945110 You have had dozens

4946069 4946704 You just happened...

4950425 4952291 Why are they doing all of this?
4952574 4955384 It is our capacity for individuality...

4955621 4958423 ...our souls that makes

4958483 4960826 They think they can find

4960831 4963658 ...if they understand

4964175 4968051 All they have are collective memories.

4968108 4969628 They're dying, you see?

4969658 4972828 Their entire race
is on the brink of extinction.
4973178 4975030 They think we can save them.

4975220 4977528 - Where do I fit in?

4978149 4980755 You resisted my attempt

4986429 4989135 ...you have developed

4989140 4991980 That is how they change things.

4992243 4994960 They have machines buried deep

4995190 4998836 ...that allow them to focus

4999844 5002210 They control everything here,

5002390 5005416 That's why it's always dark.

5005480 5006892 So why do they need you?

5007162 5010907 When they first brought us here,

5011289 5013061 So they could store the information...
5013262 5015209 ...remix it like so much paint...

5015350 5017809 ...and give us back new memories

5018009 5021460 But they still needed an artist

5023291 5026424 I understood the intricacies

5026480 5028294 ...better than they ever could...

5028894 5031823 ...so they allowed me

5031973 5033311 ...because they needed them.

5033411 5035692 But they made me

5044275 5046925 Can you imagine what

5047245 5048823 ...to erase your own past?

5049023 5052385 What about my past?

5053151 5055382 Shell Beach, Uncle Karl.
5056641 5057595 What about this?
5058773 5060552 This was blank when I found it!
5060598 5062657 You still don't understand, John.

5062677 5065844 You were never a boy...

5065883 5068594 Your entire history is an illusion,

5068595 5070278 ...as it is with all of us.

5070502 5073198 You made those drawings

5073338 5075386 You say they brought us here.
5083789 5085324 I don't remember.
5085920 5087576 None of us remember that...
5088166 5089718 ...what we once were...
5090001 5091536 ...what we might have been...
5092450 5094048 ...somewhere else.
5111132 5113052 I've taken you this far.
5113334 5115011 You don't need me anymore.
5161276 5164060 There is no ocean, John.
5164803 5167617 There is nothing beyond the city.
5168573 5171592 The only place home exists...
5173445 5175381 ...is in your head.
5222654 5224744 And now you know the truth.

5293228 5296115 You'll allow yourself

5296135 5297847 ...or it will result

5298187 5301182 What do I care?

5301183 5302280 She's nothing to me!

5302400 5306551 But you do still care,

5306781 5311200 You see, I have become the monster...

5313047 5316837 Shall I end her life now

5320038 5321720 Don't hurt her, please!
5322097 5325789 Then surrender, Mr. Murdoch.

5374245 5376817 The doctor was right.

5379054 5382362 Kill him! Kill him!

5384779 5387459 Kill him! Kill him!

5390224 5392662 He is powerful, yes.

5392822 5397198 Dangerous. But he can also

5397318 5400450 What the doctor calls the soul.

5400747 5404372 It is time for our experiment

5404502 5407111 We no longer need the other subjects.
5407241 5410568 The time for study is over.

5410911 5415150 It is time to be one

5421649 5425088 It is time, Doctor.

5428005 5430259 Shut it down!
5430809 5433715 Shut it down forever!
5447969 5449095 What are you doing?

5450162 5454560 They want to imprint you

5456023 5460116 They want to make you one of them,

5466270 5468549 Imprint, Doctor.

5470719 5473227 The pain will only last a moment.

5487512 5489538 You'll rise to greater
heights than that, my boy.

5489748 5491784 One day when you're older,

5495516 5498399 That's it, John.
Practice makes perfect.

5498529 5501576 Now remember what I told you.

5501766 5503321 John, remember.

5503662 5506344 You're probably wondering why I keep

5506444 5508923 It is because I have
inserted myself in them.

5509123 5511787 All of these memories

5511788 5512904 ...about the strangers.

5513064 5515987 Give you a lifetime of knowledge

5518816 5520635 You will survive, John.

5521301 5523314 You will find strength

5523574 5525258 ...and you will prevail.

5527772 5529829 - Hi, Uncle Karl.

5532890 5534645 You're getting the hang of it, John.

5534996 5536882 Maybe one day

5537875 5541056 This is the machine the strangers use

5541258 5544548 The machine that changes their world.

5544709 5548120 You must make the machine yours.

5548396 5550725 But you must concentrate!
5553130 5554797 Something's wrong.
5562853 5565287 There is no time for romance, John.
5565553 5566974 The world can be what you make it.
5568032 5569079 What have you done?

5570139 5572549 You have the power

5572550 5574344 ...but you must act now!
5858616 5860424 I knew you could do it, John.
5860867 5862486 You have their power now.

5866474 5869071 She is not Emma anymore, John.

5874787 5877468 ...stored the memories

5880390 5882611 What are you going to do now, John?

5884785 5888271 You told me I had

5888873 5891918 I can make these machines

5892900 5895200 Make this world anything

5896210 5900452 Just so long as I concentrate

5984418 5985526 Where are you going?
5988676 5990045 Shell Beach.

6089349 6091792 Been waiting for you, yes?

6096844 6098485 Are we sure that's what we want?
6098906 6101151 I'm prepared to take my chances.

6103197 6106665 Your imprint is not

6107501 6109604 But I wanted to know

6111068 6112522 How you feel.

6112682 6115116 You know how I was

6115435 6119174 That person isn't me.

6119444 6122814 You wanted to know what it was

6124321 6127800 Well, you're not going

6129263 6131385 You went looking

6230454 6232061 It's so beautiful here.

6245048 6247549 Do you know if Shell Beach

6247918 6250452 I think that's it just over there.
6268575 6270552 I'm headed that way myself.
6272579 6274239 Would you like to join me?
